item.title: Fix: E: Unmet dependencies. and E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
item.description: Hi there 👋 If you’re trying to install/update/remove/fix a debian package and getting the error mentioned in title, and none of the following commands are working, sudo apt-get remove sudo apt-get install sudo apt-get purge sudo apt-get autoremove sudo apt-get autoclean sudo apt-get install -f you’re at the right place. You’ll face this error if you’ve terminated the installation process of a software package. You may’ve forgotten, when and why did you terminate the installation, but that’s not an issue, you’ll still be able to fix this issue.
